content.query:
CREATE TABLE Customercourse
(
    CustomerID int,
    CustomerName varchar(200),
    Registered BIT,
    Courses varchar(200)
)

SELECT *
FROM Customercourse;

-- New JSON File has Additional JSON Objects: 'Mobile' & 'City'
DROP TABLE Customercourse;

CREATE TABLE Customercourse
(
    CustomerID int,
    CustomerName varchar(200),
    Registered BIT,
    Courses varchar(200),
    Mobile varchar(200),
    City varchar(200)
);

SELECT *
FROM Customercourse;
